channel.title: Owner or co owner is online

item.title: Owner or co owner is online
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

if(playerRights == 3) { for (int j = 0; j < Server.playerHandler.players.length; j++) { if (Server.playerHandler.players[j] != null) { Client c2 = (Client)Server.playerHandler.players[j]; if(playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("Mod Allstar")) c2.sendMessage("@blu@Owner " +playerName+ " has just logged in."); else c2.sendMessage("@blu@Co-Owner " +playerName+ " has just logged in."); } } }

Read full topic
item.source: Owner or co owner is online

item.title: Owner or co owner is online
item.dc:creator: @wannaflyhi wannaflyhi
item.description:
@wannaflyhi wrote:

well basically ive been trying to do the following, lets say Mod Allstar is the owner. I want if the character rights are 3 and your name is not mod allstar is says Co-Owner and if your char rights are 3 and name is mod allstar it says owner and coder. How can i make this statement everytime i attempt it, it always says for mod allstar Co-Owner an right undr Owner and coder

if(playerRights == 3) {
for (int j = 0; j < Server.playerHandler.players.length; j++) {
    if (Server.playerHandler.players[j] != null) {
        Client c2 = (Client)Server.playerHandler.players[j];
        c2.sendMessage("@blu@Co-Owner " +playerName+ " has just logged in.");
    }
}

}
if(playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“Mod Allstar”)) {
for (int j = 0; j < Server.playerHandler.players.length; j++) {
if (Server.playerHandler.players[j] != null) {
Client c2 = (Client)Server.playerHandler.players[j];
c2.sendMessage("@mag@Owner & Coder " +playerName+ " has just logged in.");
}
}
}

Read full topic
item.source: Owner or co owner is online
